posts.content:
VW Festival
Harewood House, Leeds, LS17 9LD
Friday 15th – Sunday 17th August 2014
www.vwfestival.co.uk ;

VW Festival, one of the biggest VW shows in the North, will be celebrating their 10th anniversary show this year. Yet again they are giving away a car for charity and this years chosen charity is the Dogs Trust.

To celebrate their 10th birthday, they want to put on a display of Split Screen Vans in association with SSVC. They would like to make this display one of the most prominent displays at the show. All the vans are also welcome to enter the show and shine competition on the Sunday as well. More details to follow on the SSVC Forum.

They would like to exclusively offer members of the SSVC a 20% discount on the pre-booked ticket price and don’t forget, pre-booked children's tickets are still free.

Please visit their website and have your SSVC membership number ready. www.vwfestival.co.uk/tickets

Standard Ticket Prices
Full Weekend Tickets - Adults £36.50 - Under 16's FREE
Short Weekend Tickets - Adults £26 - Under 16's FREE
Day Tickets - Adults £13.50 - Under 16's FREE
